rows.content: Screen two

rows.title: pin-login.js

rows.content:
STUDY TITLE
Comparing Layouts for Eye Gaze based PIN Entry

PRINCIPAL INVESTIGATORS
Krishna Kumar Venkatasubramanian, Ph.D.
Office: (401) 874-2701
Email: krish@uri.edu
KEYINFORMATION
purpose of the study is to learn about which PIN entry layouts work well for eye gaze entry. If you choose to participate, you will be asked to enter automatically generated six digit PINs in three different PIN layouts. This will take approximately one hour.Risks or discomforts from this research are expected to be minimal The study will have no direct benefits to you You will be paid $10 as a gift card for your participation You will be provided a copy of this consent form.Taking part in this research project is voluntary. You don’t have to participate and you can stop it any time.
Screen Three
